name: Chess Adventure 2.0
description:
Summary:

A 7-level point-and-click puzzle game where you play as a queen. Some levels require you to navigate through the world while avoiding danger and collecting keys to unlock the door. Other levels require precision and memorization to pass. If you make contact with a dangerous entity, you'll take damage and be sent back to the beginning of the level. It's game over if all your health is depleted. Pass through all the levels to checkmate!

White = Obstacle
Red = Danger
Black = Self
Blue = Interactable
Yellow = Collectable

Assets:
